sentence.text: In recent years, genetically determined forms of microangiopathy (e.g. transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter, CARASIL, Trex1-related microangiopathies, CARASAL, familial forms of cerebral amyloid angiopathy or CAA) have provided interesting cellular and molecular clues to the pathogenesis of sporadic microvascular disease such as arteriolosclerosis and AD-related CAA

entity.text: transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter
